channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Special Text Boxes
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Special Text Boxes

item.title: CVE-2021-24485|2024-08-03T19:35:19.796Z -- unknown -- special%20text%20boxes
item.description: The Special Text Boxes WordPress plugin before 5.9.110 does not sanitise or escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html is disallowed.
